p: Studies were performed in 25 different countries; the United States with 46 publications had the highest number of publications on this topic. ( Figure 2 ) The most common neurological symptoms in COVID-19 are headache, dizziness, anosmia, and ageusia. More severe neurological findings include stroke, impairment of consciousness, coma, seizures, neuropathy, and encephalopathy. ( Figure 3 )
